Sept. 5, 1903 D Bridlington Contest
Bridlington Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
bridlington-contest
Test Piece Contest
Gems of Welsh Melody
The Spa, Bridlington, East Yorkshire Best soprano and trombone - Scarborough Borough. Best cornet and euphonium - Wilsons Hull. Best horn - Barton Cycle Works. March contest - 1st Barton Cycle Works, 2nd Selby Town. Promoted by Bridlington Borough Band. 8 bands competed.
June 21, 2013, 10:05 a.m. June 21, 2013, 10:15 a.m.
1 Barton Cycle Works George White
2 Wilson Line A. Dennis
3 Scarborough Borough A. Blackburn
4 Beverley Borough Robert Smith
Unknown Result Selby Town T. Foster
